parameter.name: campaignId
parameter.description: The unique id for the campaign.

parameter.name: listId
parameter.description: The unique id for the list.

parameter.name: savedSegmentId
parameter.description: The id for an existing saved segment.

parameter.name: match
parameter.description: The segment match type.

parameter.name: conditions
parameter.description: The condition for segment.

parameter.name: subjectLine
parameter.description: The subject line for the campaign.

parameter.name: fromName
parameter.description: The 'from' name on the campaign (not an email address).

parameter.name: replyTo
parameter.description: The reply-to email address for the campaign.

parameter.name: campaignTitle
parameter.description: The title of the campaign.

parameter.name: useConversation
parameter.description: Boolean type, use MailChimp Conversation feature to manage out-of-office replies.

parameter.name: toName
parameter.description: The campaign's custom 'To' name.

parameter.name: folderId
parameter.description: The id for that folder.

parameter.name: authenticate
parameter.description: Boolean type, whether MailChimp authenticated the campaign. Defaults to true.

parameter.name: autoFooter
parameter.description: Boolean type, MailChimpâ€™s default footer to the campaign.

parameter.name: inlineCss
parameter.description: Boolean type, CSS included with the campaign content.

parameter.name: autoTweet
parameter.description: Boolean type, tweet a link to the campaign archive page when the campaign is sent.

parameter.name: autoFbPost
parameter.description: An array of Facebook page ids to auto-post.

parameter.name: fbComments
parameter.description: Boolean type, allows Facebook comments on the campaign. Defaults to true.

parameter.name: winnerCriteria
parameter.description: The value of winner_criteria.

parameter.name: waitTime
parameter.description: The number of minutes to wait before choosing the winning campaign.

parameter.name: testSize
parameter.description: The percentage of recipients to send the test combinations to, must be a value between 10 and 100.

parameter.name: subjectLinesForVariateSettings
parameter.description: The possible subject lines to test. If no subject lines are provided, settings.subject_line will be used.

parameter.name: sendTimes
parameter.description: The possible send times to test. The times provided should be in the format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

parameter.name: fromNames
parameter.description: The possible from names.

parameter.name: replyToAddresses
parameter.description: The possible reply-to addresses.

parameter.name: opens
parameter.description: Boolean type, whether to track opens. Defaults to true.

parameter.name: htmlClicks
parameter.description: Boolean type, whether to track clicks in the HTML version of the campaign. Defaults to true.

parameter.name: textClicks
parameter.description: Boolean type, whether to track clicks in the plain-text version of the campaign. Defaults to true.

parameter.name: goalTracking
parameter.description: Boolean type, whether to enable Goal tracking.

parameter.name: ecomm360
parameter.description: Boolean type, whether to enable eCommerce360 tracking.

parameter.name: googleAnalytics
parameter.description: The custom slug for Google Analytics tracking (max of 50 bytes).

parameter.name: clickTale
parameter.description: The custom slug for ClickTale tracking (max of 50 bytes).

parameter.name: salesforce
parameter.description: Salesforce tracking options for a campaign.

parameter.name: highRise
parameter.description: Highrise tracking options for a campaign.

parameter.name: capsule
parameter.description: Capsule tracking options for a campaign.

parameter.name: feedUrl
parameter.description: The URL for the RSS feed.

parameter.name: frequency
parameter.description: The frequency of the RSS Campaign.

parameter.name: schedule
parameter.description: The schedule for sending the RSS Campaign.

parameter.name: constrainRssImg
parameter.description: Boolean type, whether to add CSS to images in the RSS feed to constrain their width in campaigns.

parameter.name: imageUrl
parameter.description: The url for the header image for the card.

parameter.name: description
parameter.description: A short summary of the campaign to display.

parameter.name: title
parameter.description: The title for the card.
